issue.title: [C++][FlightRPC] Fix linking of Flight/gRPC example on MacOS
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17307](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17307). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`flight_grpc_example` uses `--no-as-needed` but this doesn't work on MacOS.
